name: SQLi
description:
The flag is the password for the user with username = "admin".
The password is a combination of the following characters: abcdefhijklmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ0123456789_{}

Here's the Login Site. The source code is here.
hint: Take a look at the way login.php generates the page.
